20101222000957.000|20101222001000.000|CC1|  you take once-monthly BONIVA,

20101222001002.000|20101222001002.000|CC1|       It's free to join,       
20101222001002.000|20101222001005.000|CC1|  and it shows you lots of ways 
20101222001005.000|20101222001005.000|CC1|      to help improve your      
20101222001005.000|20101222001007.000|CC1|         bone strength.

20101222001023.000|20101222001023.000|CC1|          ( announcer )         
20101222001023.000|20101222001023.000|CC1|    Don't take BONIVA if you    
20101222001023.000|20101222001025.000|CC1|  problems with your esophagus, 
20101222001025.000|20101222001025.000|CC1|       low blood calcium,       
20101222001025.000|20101222001027.000|CC1|     severe kidney disease,     
20101222001027.000|20101222001027.000|CC1|      or can't sit or stand     
20101222001027.000|20101222001029.000|CC1|     for at least one hour.     
20101222001029.000|20101222001029.000|CC1|   Follow dosing instructions   
20101222001029.000|20101222001030.000|CC1|           carefully.           
20101222001030.000|20101222001030.000|CC1|       Stop taking BONIVA       
20101222001030.000|20101222001032.000|CC1|and tell your doctor if you have
20101222001032.000|20101222001032.000|CC1|difficult or painful swallowing,
20101222001032.000|20101222001035.000|CC1|           chest pain           
20101222001035.000|20101222001035.000|CC1|            or severe           
20101222001035.000|20101222001036.000|CC1|    or continuing heartburn,    
20101222001036.000|20101222001036.000|CC1|as these may be signs of serious
20101222001036.000|20101222001039.000|CC1|    upper digestive problems.   
20101222001039.000|20101222001040.000|CC1| If jaw problems or severe bone,
20101222001040.000|20101222001040.000|CC1|    joint, and/or muscle pain

20101222001758.000|20101222001758.000|CC1|WERE YOU --                     
20101222001758.000|20101222001800.000|CC1|>> 20.                          
20101222001800.000|20101222001801.000|CC1|ELLEN: 20 LAXATIVES A DAY.      
20101222001801.000|20101222001802.000|CC1|>> YEAH.
